trans-unit.source: Represents the margins for various chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示各種圖表項目邊界。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class with the specified top, bottom, left and right coordinates of the margin.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref>類別指定的頂端、 底端、 左、 右邊界的座標。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Top margin.
Bottom margin.
Left margin.
Right margin.
Gets or sets the bottom margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>指定的物件是否等於目前的物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the hash code for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示的雜湊碼值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the margins are empty.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if all margins values are zero, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果所有的邊界值是零，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Gets or sets the right margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Gets or sets the top margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
A [RectangleF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object that has margins.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to its <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref>物件至其<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>表示法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>代表此物件的值。
